<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> "Now North, <NAME>! Shouldn't be long now!"
<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> "The Solar Tree has made a full recovery.
Your journey together with the Sun has borne fruit.
With the Solar Tree's purifying power restored, this land will recover.
The Sun and the Earth, and all living things... Everything is connected.
That connection is what sustains this world.
I don't want you to forget that.
We must fight to preserve the connection ...

<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> <PROC=1>"May the Sun be with you!"
<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> "This is not my first time on this earth.
I am called upon whenever the solar system is in danger."
<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> "Long ago... I was nothing special.
Everyone carried the Sun in their hearts.
Even on this faraway planet, the Sun never left them.
But now, human hearts are filled with darkness.
This is the opportunity they have been waiting for."
<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> "My duty is to protect this solar system
and all those raised here by the bounty of the Sun."
<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> "However, my role is only to support.
I can convey the will of the Sun... but I cannot fight."

<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> <PROC=1>"May the Sun be with you!"

<LABEL>Master Otenko:</LABEL> "<NAME>, I must talk to you about something.
It's about the Solar Gun, Gun Del Sol.
The Solar Gun takes in sunlight as its energy.
it will <WEIGHT>[overheat]</WEIGHT>. Then you won't be able to fire the Solar Gun.
At the bottom right of the screen,
<PROC=1>If the gun mark becomes an ⨯, that's a sign of trouble.
<PROC=2>If you keep on using it under strong sunlight, it will overheat.
Go into the shade and let the Solar Gun cool down.
After a while, the gun will no longer be overheated.
Even when the overheat status has ended, the gun is still very hot.
If you use it under strong sunlight, it will soon overheat again.

The Game Pak's Solar Sensor measures the strength of sunlight.
Note: The sensor doesn't work with artificial light.
In "BOKTAI," the rays caught by the sensor affect the game world.
Be careful not to drop, dirty, or otherwise damage the Game Pak.
The Solar Gun is powered by sunlight, but it will overheat if overcharged.
Be sure to take frequent breaks.
The position of the Game Pak affects how much light the sensor detects.

Let Mother Nature be your teacher!
Check the forecast and make your own BOKTAI schedule!
It's very easy to overheat under a hot Sun.
Find shade under a tree, and always wear a hat!
Sunlight is your ally. At times, however, blocking light may help.
